title: WTT T206 Devore RED HINDU SGC 30 for 1933 Goudey Ruth
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTT T206 Devore RED HINDU SGC 30 for 1933 Goudey Ruth
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade my SGC 30 T206 Josh Devore Red Hindu back (just the Red Hindu - RED AMES not included! :D) for a 1933 Goudey Ruth. We can move some cash either way to even out the deal if needed. PM or email me at [url]woelfmansteve@aol.com[/url] with scans if interested.

Thanks for looking!
